full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 155 of 262 1866 LC8Cmax5 Rodgers - direct 1 Q. Is Jeffrey Epstein a passenger on this flight? 2 A. Yes. 3 Q. From Addison, Texas, to San Antonio, Texas. SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00019017
